nodes.text: Rutian referred to one of the many skin tones of the Twi'lek species, generally denoting a color of blue.

Rutian Twi'leks included Jedi Master Aayla Secura, Jedi Padawan Eldra Kaitis, twin masseuses Ann Gella and Tann Gella, Twi'lek Resistance member Gobi Glie, Free Ryloth Movement member Isval, Free Ryloth movement strategist Kaasha Bateen, Rebel pilot Yendor, and Galactic Republic Senator Orn Free Taa.
On page 19 of the 2018 reference book Star Wars: The Complete Visual Dictionary, New Edition, which re-canonized the term, "Rutian" was misspelled as "Ruttian."
